Each stack will cause the enemy to lose HP equal to <color=#f13c3c>20% Physical DMG</color> per second and <color=#f13c3c>receive 2% more damage</color>. The effect can be stacked up to 5 times and lasts 8s.

Name: Intuitive Imagination
Desc: <color=#f13c3c>Sharp Lances</color> have <color=#f13c3c>more</color> styles and a <color=#f13c3c>bigger</color> range, and produce sector shockwaves of a <color=#f13c3c>bigger</color> range. All damage dealt by <color=#f13c3c>Sharp Lances</color> increases by <color=#f13c3c>30%</color>.

Name: Hymn of Nature
Desc: The target hit by <color=#f13c3c>Sharp Lance</color>'s single-target damage will increase all subsequent damage dealt by <color=#f13c3c>Sharp Lance</color> by <color=#f13c3c>2%</color>. It lasts permanently and can be stacked up to 8 times.

Name: Powerful Expression
Desc: Every time when Matrix is triggered, reduce all <color=#f13c3c>Sharp Lance</color> skill cooldowns by <color=#f13c3c>2s</color>.

Name: Fabulous Depiction
